assignments.description: Sets the result date to the be equal to the formula result that adds days.
assignments.name: Set_result_date
assignments.label: Set result date

assignments.description: Sets the result date to the be equal to the formula result that subtracts days.
assignments.name: Set_result_date_subtract
assignments.label: Set result date

decisions.description: Routes to different calculations depending on whether we are dealing with the addition or subtraction of business days.
decisions.name: Add_or_subtract
decisions.label: Add or subtract?

Flow.description: This flow takes a starting date and number of business days as inputs, providing a resulting date as an output. Business days should be a negative number to subtract them.

formulas.description: The resultant date if adding business days.
formulas.name: result_date_add
formulas.expression: {!start_date} + CASE( MOD( {!start_date} - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, {!business_days} + FLOOR({!business_days} / 5) * 2, 1, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} + 1) / 5) * 2, 2, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} + 2) / 5) * 2, 3, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} + 3) / 5) * 2, 4, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} + 4) / 5) * 2, 5, {!business_days} + FLOOR({!business_days} / 5) * 2 + 2, 6, {!business_days} + FLOOR({!business_days} / 5) * 2 + 1, null)

formulas.description: The resultant date if subtracting business days.
formulas.name: result_date_subtract
formulas.expression: {!start_date} + CASE( MOD( {!start_date} - DATE(1900, 1, 1), 7), 0, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} - 4 ) / 5) * 2, 1, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} - 3) / 5 ) * 2, 2, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} - 2)/ 5 ) * 2, 3, {!business_days} + FLOOR(({!business_days} - 1 )/ 5 ) * 2, 4, {!business_days} + FLOOR({!business_days} / 5) * 2, 5, {!business_days} + FLOOR({!business_days} / 5) * 2 - 1, 6, {!business_days} + FLOOR({!business_days} / 5) * 2 - 2, null)

Flow.label: Date - add/subtract business days

variables.description: The number of business days to be added (if a positive number) or subtracted (if a negative number).
variables.name: business_days

variables.description: The date that results from taking the start date and adding or subtracting the number of business days.
variables.name: result_date

variables.description: The starting date in the calculation from/to which business days will be subtracted/added.
variables.name: start_date
